InstanceManager.name: InstanceManager

constructors.description:
Stores instances of JavaScript components. Allows a constructor to be passed in place of an instance. This enables lazy construction on demand.

One use is to create a global repository of JavaScript components attached to DOM id's, e.g., YUI Buttons built on top of HTML buttons.

params.name: id
params.description: The id of the object to retrieve.

return.description: the object that was removed or false if the slot was empty

params.name: id
params.description: The id of the object to retrieve.

getIfConstructed.description: Retrieve an object only if it has already been constructed.

return.description: false if the id has already been used

params.name: objOrCtor
params.description: The object or the object's constructor.

params.name: args
params.description: The array of arguments to pass to the constructor.

params.type: Function|String|Object} The function to call or the name of the function or an object {fn:,scope:
params.name: behavior
arguments
params.description: The arguments to pass to the function.

params.name: skip_unconstructed
params.description: Optional. Pass true to skip unconstructed slots.

applyToAll.description: Call a function on every object.
